title: Theodore Gerasimov
text:
Fedya Gerasimov


I’m a rising 3rd year Mathematics PhD student at Rice University. My interests are discrete and convex geometry. In 2019, I received my B.S. in Applied Mathematics and Computer Science from the Moscow Institute of Physics and Technology.

title: CV
text:
Education

Ph.D. in Mathematics, Rice University (expected 2028)
B.S. in Mathematics, Moscow Institute of Physics and Technology (2019)

title: CV
text:

Discrete and Convex Geometry

title: CV
